name: Education of an Android
description:
By purchasing the prototype you are supporting this game

...............................................................

Education of an Android

Education of an Android is an exploration and puzzle game, where you play an android endowed with an artificial heart capable of feeling emotions.

The player will have to complete a series of tests conducted by its creator to perfect its sensitivity.

...............................................................

Controls :

Move : arrows keys

Actions : Mouse

...............................................................
